price: 29. Мре kokanga maboko nayo na kingo koleka te, (na kimopimi) mpe kotanda yango te koleka, noki te okomikuta okati ya batungisami mpe bato ya mpasi.
arabic: وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡ يَدَكَ مَغۡلُولَةً إِلَىٰ عُنُقِكَ وَلَا تَبۡسُطۡهَا كُلَّ ٱلۡبَسۡطِ فَتَقۡعُدَ مَلُومٗا مَّحۡسُورًا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walā tajʿal yadaka maghlūlatan ilā ʿunuqika walā tabsuṭ'hā kulla al-basṭi fataqʿuda malūman maḥsūran
